spec_data.Name: perl-MooseX-OneArgNew
spec_data.Description:
MooseX::OneArgNew lets your constructor take a single argument, which will
be translated into the value for a one-entry hashref. It is a parameterized
role with two parameters:
spec_data.Signature: RSA/SHA256, Fri 28 Jul 2017 01:57:48 PM EDT, Key ID f55e7430f5282ee4
spec_data.Summary: Teach ->new to accept single, non-hashref arguments
